data.name: American Truck Simulator - Heavy Cargo Pack
data.detailed_description:
It takes more than a standard semi-trailer to deliver these loads! When a cargo gets heavy, it's time for more axles to satisfy the DOT and make it safely across that bridge! Introducing complex multi-joint trailers with jeeps and boosters spreading the weight of the cargo.

New Cargoes


  • Crawler Tractor
  • Bulldozer
  • Lift Truck Chassis
  • Lift Truck
  • Cable Reel
  • Milling Machine
  • All Terrain Crane
  • Scraper
  • Transformer
data.about_the_game:
It takes more than a standard semi-trailer to deliver these loads! When a cargo gets heavy, it's time for more axles to satisfy the DOT and make it safely across that bridge! Introducing complex multi-joint trailers with jeeps and boosters spreading the weight of the cargo.

New Cargoes


  • Crawler Tractor
  • Bulldozer
  • Lift Truck Chassis
  • Lift Truck
  • Cable Reel
  • Milling Machine
  • All Terrain Crane
  • Scraper
  • Transformer
data.short_description: Test your truck driver skills with new trailers and cargoes included in Heavy Cargo Pack. Take advantage of high-tech trailers supporting steerable axles for safer navigation around tight bends. Challenge yourself with all-new heavy haul duties.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (2 GB)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 (Yosemite)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (Intel HD 5300)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
